message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to our negotiations
You wanted 50/50, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of negotiating with you!
You think you deserve more for taking the risk? I think I deserve more for being willing to negotiate with you!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 58/42 is a more reasonable split
You're getting closer, but I think I'm still underpaid for my negotiation skills!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'm not willing to give you 60% of the remaining value. I'll make a new offer that's more in line with the decreasing value of the money
I'm taking a risk, but I think I can get a better deal. I'll give you 64% of the remaining value, but that's as high as I'm willing to go
